title: Colorado Opportunity Scholarship Initiative (COSI) Scholarships
description: To provide support for low-income students with high need (students participating in CU LEAD programs) at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent:
To learn more visit the CU Boulder COSI site.

As a result of the Colorado Opportunity Scholarship Initiative (COSI) grant, your gift to the CU Boulder COSI Scholarship will be matched 1:1 to double your impact!
